alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Granite and north central Ravalli Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodside, or 10 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodside and Corvallis. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 51 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
